summary: Weather app that asks for a location, displays the temperature and current weather for that place, and provides contextual warnings/advice (e.g., carry an umbrella).

existing_features.title: Create a weather lookup flow that prompts the user for a location via typed input (e.g., city/town name) and allows selecting the intended place when multiple matches exist.
Fetch and display the selected location’s current temperature and current weather conditions using a public weather API, with loading and error states.
Generate and display contextual weather warnings/advice (e.g., “Carry an umbrella”) based on the fetched conditions.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme across the UI (colors, typography, spacing, and components) suitable for a consumer weather app, avoiding a default/unstyled look.
Add generated static image assets to the app and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow user to provide/confirm a location to get local weather
Show temperature and current weather conditions for the selected location
Display contextual weather warnings/advice (e.g., carry an umbrella) based on conditions
